last_episode_to_air.name: With Mirth in Funeral and With Dirge in Marriage
last_episode_to_air.overview: The rest of the family unites to combat a formidable foe.

name: The Royals
overview: Drama about a fictional British Royal family set in modern day London, who inhabit a world of opulence and regal tradition that caters to any and every desire, but one that also comes with a price tag of duty, destiny and intense public scrutiny.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Set in modern-day England, The Royals follows the lives of a fictional British Royal family that inhabits a world of opulence and regal tradition catering to any and every desire - a world that also comes with a price tag of duty, destiny, and intense public scrutiny. Prince Liam is thrust into the spotlight after his older brother's death puts him next in line to the throne.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After the tragic murder of King Simon by an unknown assailant, Cyrus, Simon's arrogant brother, has taken the throne with the help of Queen Helena.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season 3 picks up after Ted Pryce's execution and deals with how the death of King Simon's killer impacts the family, especially Liam. Prince Robert is revealed to be alive, just as Liam & Eleanor's legitimacy is being debated, while new alliances, conflicts, and love triangles threaten to impact the family's very public image and the private reality that Queen Helena will protect at all cost.

episodes.name: Stand and Unfold Yourself
episodes.overview: After the sudden death of their older brother and heir to the throne, Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor have a hard time with their new roles. Queen Helena tries to maintain the family's image and King Simon questions the monarchy's future.

episodes.name: Infants of the Spring
episodes.overview: At the annual garden party, Prince Liam is reunited with his ex, Gemma. The Queen and Cyrus work to counteract King Simon's wishes.

episodes.name: We Are Pictures, or Mere Beasts
episodes.overview: The Queen and Princess Eleanor throw competing fashion shows during London's fashion week while Prince Liam narrowly avoids a catastrophe.

episodes.name: Sweet, Not Lasting
episodes.overview: Prince Liam does his first PR tour as heir to the throne while Queen Helena forces Princess Eleanor to do a PR tour of London.

episodes.name: Unmask Her Beauty to the Moon
episodes.overview: Prince Liam, Princess Eleanor and Queen Helena's romances are a popular topic at the annual masquerade ball.

episodes.name: The Slings and Arrows of Outrageous Fortune
episodes.overview: A trip to Monaco helps Prince Liam and Ophelia's relationship blossom but a different side of Princess Eleanor is revealed.

episodes.name: Your Sovereignty of Reason
episodes.overview: The King makes a decision that impacts the rest of the family while Ophelia struggles with the PR fallout from Monaco.

episodes.name: The Great Man Down
episodes.overview: The Royal Family is put on lockdown in a safe room at the palace after an assassination attempt.

episodes.name: In My Heart There Was a Kind of Fighting
episodes.overview: When someone from Prince Robert's past pays them a visit, Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor must face their own personal demons.

episodes.name: Our Wills and Fates Do So Contrary Run
episodes.overview: Secrets are revealed as Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor investigate Prince Robert’s death and the attack on the throne.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Set in modern-day England, The Royals follows the lives of a fictional British Royal family that inhabits a world of opulence and regal tradition catering to any and every desire - a world that also comes with a price tag of duty, destiny, and intense public scrutiny. Prince Liam is thrust into the spotlight after his older brother's death puts him next in line to the throne.

episodes.name: It Is Not, nor It Cannot Come to Good
episodes.overview: In the wake of King Simon’s death, King Cyrus’ new look monarchy is on full display at the Royal polo match, Prince Liam is hell-bent on revenge and receives some unexpected help, and Queen Helena maneuvers for power.

episodes.name: Welcome Is Fashion and Ceremony
episodes.overview: In Prince Liam's quest for vengeance, a secret is revealed that affects the monarchy's future while Princess Eleanor rekindles an old flame.

episodes.name: Is Not This Something More Than Fantasy?
episodes.overview: Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor both take trips that don’t end as they expected, while at home Queen Helena meets a new rival and King Cyrus receives some bad news.

episodes.name: What, Has This Thing Appear'd Again Tonight?
episodes.overview: King Cyrus draws a line in the sand with Queen Helena and Prince Liam as he does whatever he can to eliminate King Simon’s legacy. Princess Eleanor makes a friend as a new wrinkle in the King’s murder is potentially revealed.

episodes.name: The Spirit That I Have Seen
episodes.overview: Princess Eleanor’s new relationship makes waves in and outside of the palace as King Cyrus uses a public ceremony to solidify his image and Queen Helena learns of betrayal.

episodes.name: Doubt Truth to Be a Liar
episodes.overview: The twins have a birthday party in the palace and things get out of hand. Queen Helena and Prince Liam look to the past for answers about the future.

episodes.name: Taint Not Thy Mind, nor Let Thy Soul Contrive Against Thy Mother
episodes.overview: Queen Helena and Princess Eleanor share some unexpected bonding time as Prince Liam investigates Domino.

episodes.name: Be All My Sins Remembered
episodes.overview: Relationships are forever changed when The Royals’ family history is called in to question.

episodes.name: And Then It Started Like a Guilty Thing
episodes.overview: Uncertainty abounds as questions of the King’s killer come to the forefront and the monarchy’s structure is challenged.

episodes.name: The Serpent That Did Sting Thy Father's Life
episodes.overview: The royal family faces the possibility of the abolition of the monarchy.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: After the tragic murder of King Simon by an unknown assailant, Cyrus, Simon's arrogant brother, has taken the throne with the help of Queen Helena.

episodes.name: Together With Remembrance
episodes.overview: In the wake of the death of King Simon's murderer, the royal family returns with a fresh perspective. Liam seeks solace in disreputable places, while Prince Robert is revealed to be alive.

episodes.name: Passing Through Nature to Eternity
episodes.overview: Helena plans to secure proof. Liam begins a new but complicated relationship. Jasper and Eleanor look to the past to inspire their future.

episodes.name: Aye, There's the Rub
episodes.overview: While under the weather, Helena gets hooked on a reality television program. The true paternity of Liam and Eleanor is revealed at a time when the prince and princess are each focusing on passionate relationships.

episodes.name: Our (Late) Dear Brother's Death
episodes.overview: Jasper and Eleanor immerse themselves in their relationship while Liam must reappraise his latest tryst, King Cyrus' past pays him a visit and the palace arranges a press conference to announce earth shattering news.

episodes.name: Born to Set it Right
episodes.overview: On the eve of a very public appearance, the family's private turmoil threatens to go public. Beck returns to the palace with his sights set on Eleanor, and a confrontation with Jasper ensues.

episodes.name: More Than Kin, and Less Than Kind
episodes.overview: Christmas comes to the palace. Liam impulsively releases the staff, forcing the family to fend for themselves. A sexual dalliance for Helena has unexpected consequences.

episodes.name: The Counterfeit Presentment of Two Brothers
episodes.overview: The royals prepare for the People's Gala, where each member of the family is auctioned off for charity. Cyrus initiates a plan to retain his crown. Liam and Robert square off in a charity boxing match.

episodes.name: In the Same Figure, Like the King That's Dead
episodes.overview: Jasper tries to strike a bargain to protect his past and secure his future. Helena slips away for a romantic trip to Paris. Eleanor participates in a nearly naked tiger run. Liam and Willow try to navigate emotional waters.

episodes.name: O, Farewell, Honest Soldier
episodes.overview: Eleanor and Queen Helena consider romantic invitations. A Privy Council meets to determine who will reign as the one true King Of England. Jasper reveals to Liam information that presents a new mystery for the monarchy.

episodes.name: To Show My Duty in Your Coronation
episodes.overview: Liam finds himself in unexpected places, Helena's heart breaks over a recent loss and Jasper makes a final play for Eleanor's heart. Historic changes assure that nothing will ever be the same.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season 3 picks up after Ted Pryce's execution and deals with how the death of King Simon's killer impacts the family, especially Liam. Prince Robert is revealed to be alive, just as Liam & Eleanor's legitimacy is being debated, while new alliances, conflicts, and love triangles threaten to impact the family's very public image and the private reality that Queen Helena will protect at all cost.

episodes.name: How Prodigal the Soul
episodes.overview: Robert gains popularity on his coronation tour, while Jasper and Liam have information that could end his reign; Eleanor must choose between returning to Jasper or working abroad with Sebastian.

episodes.name: Confess Yourself to Heaven
episodes.overview: Cyrus helps Liam gather intel on Robert. A contender emerges as Helena and Willow assess possible brides for Robert. Jasper goes rogue at a press conference, while Eleanor watches.

episodes.name: Seek for Thy Noble Father in the Dust
episodes.overview: Liam makes a big move with the evidence he has on Robert; Eleanor uses her status to help others; Helena finds herself at the center of a new scandal.

episodes.name: Black as His Purpose Did the Night Resemble
episodes.overview: A total blackout sparks chaos in London; Willow's feelings for Robert grow stronger; Eleanor opens the palace to the public; Jasper finds himself in the middle of a riot.

episodes.name: There's Daggers in Men's Smiles
episodes.overview: Robert extends his power further than ever before and exiles a disloyal Cyrus. Eleanor undertakes a covert mission and Helena explores her romantic options.

episodes.name: My News Shall Be the Fruit to That Great Feast
episodes.overview: Tensions rise at a family dinner celebrating the queen's birthday, as Liam brings a surprising guest and Jasper finds out the identity of the man who shot him.

episodes.name: Forgive Me This My Virtue
episodes.overview: Eleanor enlists Jasper's help for one of her covert missions. Helena begins a new chapter at a royal event where the press attacks Willow. Cyrus meets an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: In the Dead Vast and Middle of the Night
Foul Deeds Will Rise
episodes.overview: Liam's true intentions are revealed; Jasper helps Liam with a plan.

episodes.name: With Mirth in Funeral and With Dirge in Marriage
episodes.overview: The rest of the family unites to combat a formidable foe.
